title: Lamad Learning Paths Product Tests
description: BDD product tests validating learning path navigation and progression in Lamad
content:
Feature: Lamad Learning Paths
  As a learner using Lamad
  I want to navigate through learning paths
  So that I can follow a structured learning journey

  @smoke @lamad @api
  Scenario: Learning paths API returns data
    Given the backend API is available
    When I request the learning paths from the API
    Then the response should be successful
    And the response should contain paths

  @lamad @navigation
  Scenario: Learning paths are displayed
    Given I am on the Lamad section
    Then at least one learning path should be displayed

  @lamad @navigation @workflow
  Scenario: User can navigate to a learning path
    Given I am on the Lamad section
    When I click on the first learning path
    Then the page should load successfully
    And the content should finish loading

  @lamad @data
  Scenario: Learning path shows title and description
    Given I am on the Lamad section
    Then each path should show a title and description

  @lamad @api @data
  Scenario: API paths match displayed paths
    Given the backend API is available
    When I request the learning paths from the API
    Then the response should contain paths
    And the learning paths should match the API data

openGraph.title: Lamad Learning Paths Product Tests
openGraph.description: BDD product tests for learning path navigation
